title: Banned, No Email
body: I was banned for saying some pretty stupid things, ill be honest. But I didnt receive an email as to WHY exactly i was banned. There's no way I can respond asking for an unban if I dont get the email.. so.. im screwed.

replies.body: You don't get an email. You can see your reform card, including the in-game chat which you were banned for by logging into the client with your account.
You should see something upon relogging. If not, send in a support ticket. Good luck!
Mute all every game my dude, getting mad at teammates isnt worth it.  I just tune them out the minute someone starts getting tilted
I believe you now need to ask for it in a support ticket.
